description: Monitor review submissions, verify publication on platforms, respond to feedback, and gain insights from comprehensive analytics—all in one dashboard.

key_features.title: Comprehensive Analytics
key_features.description: Track response rates, average ratings, review velocity, and platform distribution with detailed performance metrics.

key_features.title: Real-Time Notifications
key_features.description: Get instant notifications when new reviews come in so you never miss an opportunity to respond promptly.

key_features.title: Direct Response Management
key_features.description: Respond to reviews directly from your dashboard for connected platforms like Google Business Profile.

key_features.title: Sentiment Analysis
key_features.description: Monitor customer sentiment trends and identify patterns to catch issues early and capitalize on successes.

key_features.title: Advanced Filtering
key_features.description: Filter reviews by rating, date, platform, or keywords to quickly find and manage specific types of feedback.

key_features.title: Export & Reporting
key_features.description: Generate custom reports and export review data for deeper analysis or sharing with stakeholders.

how_it_works.title: Monitor All Reviews
how_it_works.description: Your dashboard automatically tracks reviews from all connected platforms and prompt page submissions in one central location.

how_it_works.title: Get Instant Alerts
how_it_works.description: Receive notifications for new reviews, changes in review status, and when responses are needed to maintain your reputation.

how_it_works.title: Respond & Engage
how_it_works.description: Reply to reviews directly from the dashboard, thank positive reviewers, and address concerns from negative feedback professionally.

how_it_works.title: Analyze & Improve
how_it_works.description: Use analytics and trends to identify what customers love and what needs improvement, then optimize your service accordingly.

best_practices.title: Respond Quickly
best_practices.description: Aim to respond to reviews within 24-48 hours. Quick responses show you care and can turn negative experiences into positive ones.

best_practices.title: Personalize Your Responses
best_practices.description: Use the reviewer's name and reference specific details from their review. Avoid generic templates that feel robotic.

best_practices.title: Address Issues Constructively
best_practices.description: For negative reviews, acknowledge the issue, apologize if appropriate, and offer to resolve the problem offline.

best_practices.title: Learn from Patterns
best_practices.description: Look for recurring themes in feedback to identify systemic issues or consistently praised aspects of your service.
